title: The new Windows 11 features coming in 2024
description: Windows 11 is gearing up to introduce an array of exciting new features in 2024 aimed at enhancing user experience across various aspects of the operating system. [...]

title: GrapheneOS: Frequent Android auto-reboots block firmware exploits
description: GrapheneOS, a privacy and security-focused Android-based operating system, has posted a series of tweets on X suggesting that Android should introduce frequent auto-reboots to make it harder for forensic software vendors to exploit firmware flaws and spy on the users. [...]

title: Save up to $315 on data privacy tools with AdGuard VPN
description: A VPN is the first defense you have again ISP throttling, commercial data trackers, and malicious actors. AdGuard VPN has three deals to choose from now through January 14th. [...]
